fxInfo_citation: Pemstein et al. (2018, V-Dem Working Paper Series 2018:21); V-Dem Codebook (see suggested citation at the top of this document).
fxInfo_question: In which geographic area do the support groups for the current political regime mainly reside? Do not code for years denoted as "interregnum".

fxInfo_responses.value: In urban areas outside the capital.
The groups are not concentrated in any particular area.
